summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, authorizing the grant of an easement to the Alderwood Water District for the construction, operation and maintenance of a water transmission pipeline and appurtenances for Segment 2 of the Clearview Water Supply Project (P.M. \#'s 270516-2-301, 270521-2-302, 270521-3-301, 270528-2- 301, 270528-3-302 and 270528-3-303).
